001package org.jfree.chart.plot;
002
003
004import java.awt.Font;
005import java.awt.Paint;
006import java.awt.Color;
007import java.awt.Stroke;
008import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
009import java.io.Serializable;
010
011public class PolarPlotProduct2 implements Serializable, Cloneable {
012        private boolean angleLabelsVisible = true;
013        private Font angleLabelFont = new Font("SansSerif", Font.PLAIN, 12);
014        private transient Paint angleLabelPaint = Color.BLACK;
015        private boolean angleGridlinesVisible;
016        private transient Stroke angleGridlineStroke;
017        private transient Paint angleGridlinePaint;
018        private boolean radiusGridlinesVisible;
019        private transient Stroke radiusGridlineStroke;
020        private transient Paint radiusGridlinePaint;
021
022        public boolean getAngleLabelsVisible() {
023                return angleLabelsVisible;
024        }
025
026        public Font getAngleLabelFont() {
027                return angleLabelFont;
028        }
029
030        public Paint getAngleLabelPaint() {
031                return angleLabelPaint;
032        }
033
034        public void setAngleLabelPaint2(Paint angleLabelPaint) {
035                this.angleLabelPaint = angleLabelPaint;
036        }
037
038        public boolean getAngleGridlinesVisible() {
039                return angleGridlinesVisible;
040        }
041
042        public void setAngleGridlinesVisible2(boolean angleGridlinesVisible) {
043                this.angleGridlinesVisible = angleGridlinesVisible;
044        }
045
046        public Stroke getAngleGridlineStroke() {
047                return angleGridlineStroke;
048        }
049
050        public void setAngleGridlineStroke2(Stroke angleGridlineStroke) {
051                this.angleGridlineStroke = angleGridlineStroke;
052        }
053
054        public Paint getAngleGridlinePaint() {
055                return angleGridlinePaint;
056        }
057
058        public void setAngleGridlinePaint2(Paint angleGridlinePaint) {
059                this.angleGridlinePaint = angleGridlinePaint;
060        }
061
062        public boolean getRadiusGridlinesVisible() {
063                return radiusGridlinesVisible;
064        }
065
066        public void setRadiusGridlinesVisible2(boolean radiusGridlinesVisible) {
067                this.radiusGridlinesVisible = radiusGridlinesVisible;
068        }
069
070        public Stroke getRadiusGridlineStroke() {
071                return radiusGridlineStroke;
072        }
073
074        public void setRadiusGridlineStroke2(Stroke radiusGridlineStroke) {
075                this.radiusGridlineStroke = radiusGridlineStroke;
076        }
077
078        public Paint getRadiusGridlinePaint() {
079                return radiusGridlinePaint;
080        }
081
082        public void setRadiusGridlinePaint2(Paint radiusGridlinePaint) {
083                this.radiusGridlinePaint = radiusGridlinePaint;
084        }
085
086        /**
087        * Sets the flag that controls whether or not the angle labels are visible, and sends a  {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
088        * @param visible   the flag.
089        * @see #isAngleLabelsVisible()
090        */
091        public void setAngleLabelsVisible(boolean visible, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
092                if (this.angleLabelsVisible != visible) {
093                        this.angleLabelsVisible = visible;
094                        polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
095                }
096        }
097
098        /**
099        * Sets the font used to display the angle labels and sends a {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
100        * @param font   the font ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
101        * @see #getAngleLabelFont()
102        */
103        public void setAngleLabelFont(Font font, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
104                Args.nullNotPermitted(font, "font");
105                this.angleLabelFont = font;
106                polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
107        }
108
109        /**
110        * Sets the paint used to display the angle labels and sends a {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
111        * @param paint   the paint ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
112        */
113        public void setAngleLabelPaint(Paint paint, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
114                Args.nullNotPermitted(paint, "paint");
115                this.angleLabelPaint = paint;
116                polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
117        }
118
119        /**
120        * Sets the stroke for the grid lines plotted against the angular axis and sends a  {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners. <p> If you set this to  {@code  null} , no grid lines will be drawn.
121        * @param stroke   the stroke ( {@code  null}  permitted).
122        * @see #getAngleGridlineStroke()
123        */
124        public void setAngleGridlineStroke(Stroke stroke, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
125                this.angleGridlineStroke = stroke;
126                polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
127        }
128
129        /**
130        * Sets the paint for the grid lines plotted against the angular axis. <p> If you set this to  {@code  null} , no grid lines will be drawn.
131        * @param paint   the paint ( {@code  null}  permitted).
132        * @see #getAngleGridlinePaint()
133        */
134        public void setAngleGridlinePaint(Paint paint, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
135                this.angleGridlinePaint = paint;
136                polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
137        }
138
139        /**
140        * Sets the stroke for the grid lines plotted against the radius axis and sends a  {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners. <p> If you set this to  {@code  null} , no grid lines will be drawn.
141        * @param stroke   the stroke ( {@code  null}  permitted).
142        * @see #getRadiusGridlineStroke()
143        */
144        public void setRadiusGridlineStroke(Stroke stroke, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
145                this.radiusGridlineStroke = stroke;
146                polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
147        }
148
149        /**
150        * Sets the paint for the grid lines plotted against the radius axis and sends a  {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners. <p> If you set this to  {@code  null} , no grid lines will be drawn.
151        * @param paint   the paint ( {@code  null}  permitted).
152        * @see #getRadiusGridlinePaint()
153        */
154        public void setRadiusGridlinePaint(Paint paint, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
155                this.radiusGridlinePaint = paint;
156                polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
157        }
158
159        /**
160        * Sets the flag that controls whether or not the angular grid-lines are visible. <p> If the flag value is changed, a  {@link PlotChangeEvent}  is sent to all registered listeners.
161        * @param visible   the new value of the flag.
162        * @see #isAngleGridlinesVisible()
163        */
164        public void setAngleGridlinesVisible(boolean visible, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
165                if (this.angleGridlinesVisible != visible) {
166                        this.angleGridlinesVisible = visible;
167                        polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
168                }
169        }
170
171        /**
172        * Sets the flag that controls whether or not the radius axis grid lines are visible. <p> If the flag value is changed, a  {@link PlotChangeEvent}  is sent to all registered listeners.
173        * @param visible   the new value of the flag.
174        * @see #isRadiusGridlinesVisible()
175        */
176        public void setRadiusGridlinesVisible(boolean visible, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
177                if (this.radiusGridlinesVisible != visible) {
178                        this.radiusGridlinesVisible = visible;
179                        polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
180                }
181        }
182
183        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
184                return (PolarPlotProduct2) super.clone();
185        }
186}
